short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View your Spotify statistics and control your Spotify player

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take control of your Spotify experience with Dashify, the ultimate dashboard for your music. 

Seamlessly integrated into every new Chrome tab, our extension lets you manage your Spotify playback without missing a beat. Whether you're pausing, skipping, or shuffling, Dashify puts the power of your playlist right at your fingertips. 

You can also dive into your listening habits with insightful statistics on your most-played artists and songs, all displayed in a sleek, user-friendly interface. Elevate your music journey with Dashify—the smarter way to enjoy Spotify.

GETTING STARTED:

Signing in to Dashify is simple and secure. Just click the "Sign in with Spotify" button, authorize the connection in the pop-up window, and you're all set to control your music. Rest assured, the new window is opened through Spotify and authenticated through them so we don’t store any of your data—your Spotify credentials remain completely private and secure.

Check out the code here: https://github.com/scottsak/SpotifyDashboard
